original_text: If thy brother, the son of thy mother, or thy son, or thy daughter, or the wife of thy bosom, or thy friend, which is as thine own soul, entice thee secretly, saying, Let us go and serve other gods, which thou hast not known, thou, nor thy fathers;
korean_text: 네 어머니의 아들 곧 네 형제나 네 자녀나 네 품의 아내나 너와 생명을 함께 하는 친구가 가만히 너를 꾀어 이르기를 너와 네 조상들이 알지 못하던 다른 신들

sentences.original_text: If thy brother, the son of thy mother,
or thy son, or thy daughter,
or the wife of thy bosom,
or thy friend, which is as thine own soul,
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 네 자신의 영혼 같은 네 친구가

sentences.original_text: saying, Let us go and serve other gods,
